meanings.sent1: She outthrust her hand to grab the ball.
meanings.sent2: The tree branches outthrust towards the sky.

meanings.sent4: The sun outthrust its rays, warming the earth below.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outthrust flames as it launched into space.

meanings.sent1: He outthrust his chin defiantly during the argument.
